sentences.en: Audit the daily General Cashier's Report against recorded cash movements.
sentences.cn: 审核总出纳每日报告,并且比对现金变动记录.

sentences.en: Audit was a sitting of the council in Exchequer.
sentences.cn: 审议是该会议在财政部的一次例令.

sentences.en: Computerized audit routines and crosschecks with state tax records " flag'suspicious returns for further analysis.
sentences.cn: 电脑化的审计程序及与州税务档案的反复核对亮出可疑收益的 " 信号 " 以作进一步的分析.

sentences.en: Conduct process audit to make sure quality control system was implemented effectively.
sentences.cn: 通过实施过程审核确保质量控制系统能有效的运行.

sentences.en: Design product and audit drawing and the design documents.
sentences.cn: 产品设计以及图样和设计文件的审核.

sentences.en: Each year they audit our accounts and certify them as being true and fair.
sentences.cn: 每年他们都会审核我们的账目，以证明其准确合理。

sentences.en: Essentially, we maintain a clear audit trail of his actions.
sentences.cn: 本质上说, 我们对他的行为保留一份清晰的审核踪迹.

sentences.en: Make internal audit about this inside of logistic department.
sentences.cn: 负责部门流程执行实施情况的内部审核.

sentences.en: Pls provide your certificate copy and whole audit report within this cycle.
sentences.cn: 请提供有效认证证书及此周期审核报告.

sentences.en: The Audit Commission was formerly known as the Audit Department.
sentences.cn: 审计署(前称核数署)根据《基本法》而设立.

sentences.en: The clerk was told to send the schedule up the audit department.
sentences.cn: 那个职员奉使将进度表呈递到审计处.

sentences.en: The enterprise self - audit is designed to force managers to meet this situation.
sentences.cn: 企业的 自我 审计就是为了增强管理人员对这些情况的适应性而设置的.

sentences.en: The tort is the behavior that the CPA provides mendacious audIt'statement.
sentences.cn: 侵权行为指注册会计师出具不实的审计报告的行为.

sentences.en: The very term auditor and audit makes many of us feel uncomfortable.
sentences.cn: 一说起审计师和审计,我们中的许多人都会感到不安.

sentences.en: We believe that our audit provides a reasonable basis for our opinion.
sentences.cn: 我们相信,我们的审计为我们的审计意见提供了合理的基础.

sentences.en: Why did the bank not conduct its own audit before lending still more?
sentences.cn: 银行为什么不在贷出更多钱之前先审计自己的账目呢？

phrases.tran_cn: 审计程序；查帐程序，检查程序
审查跟踪，尾随审查；查帐索引；逐位跟踪
合规性审计；符合规章审计；法规符合审计
能源审计；能源审核；节能审查

trans.tran_en: an official examination of a company’s financial records in order to check that they are correct
an official examination of a company’s financial records in order to check that they are correct
to officially examine a company’s financial records in order to check that they are correct
